name: Borderless Access
overview:
Borderless Access is the Emerging Market online research specialist with over a decade long experience in building and maintaining panels across geographies and cultures. We have proprietary panels in Brazil, Russia, India, China (BRIC) and our global footprint and partnership lets us reach over 60 million consumers across 65 countries. We are a subsidiary to Cross-Tab, a market research leader, providing a full range of market research and data analytics solutions to global clients. We invest heavily in our panellists and help companies globally to fulfil their research needs by connecting with their consumers online. We have a rich experience in managing culturally diverse online projects ranging from standard to ad-hoc, trackers to dip stick studies. Borderless Access has been awarded the Grand Mean Project Certification from Sample Source Auditors (Mktg Inc.) for exceeding their quality parameters as a sample source that does not exhibit outlier characteristics.
